# csi-cybersec

# encrypted.txt
the encrypted.txt file was a file with spaces and tab. I encoded each space as 0 and tab as 1. Then I grouped the long binary string into groups of 8.

## This was the result:
```
01100011 01110011 01101001 01111101
01101110 01110100 01101000 01101001
01110011 01101001 01110011 01101010
01110101 01110011 01110100 01100001
01100010 01101001 01101110 01100001
01110010 01111001 01101101 01100101
01110011 01110011 01100001 01100111
01100101 01100010 01100101 01110100
01110100 01100101 01110010 01110100
01101000 01101001 01101110 01101011
01100001 01100111 01100001 01101001
01101110 01110100 01101000 01101001
01110011 01101001 01110011 01101010
01110101 01110011 01110100 01100001
01100010 01101001 01101110 01100001
01110010 01111001 01101101 01100101
```

## I converted each of them into a decimal, which I then converted to their corresponding ASCII.
```
01100011 -> 99 -> "c"
01110011 -> 115 -> "s"
01101001 -> 105 -> "i"
01111101 -> 125 -> "}"
01101110 -> 110 -> "n"
01110100 -> 116 -> "t"
01101000 -> 104 -> "h"
01101001 -> 105 -> "i"
01110011 -> 115 -> "s"
01101001 -> 105 -> "i"
01110011 -> 115 -> "s"
01101010 -> 106 -> "j"
01110101 -> 117 -> "u"
01110011 -> 115 -> "s"
01110100 -> 116 -> "t"
01100001 -> 97 -> "a"
01100010 -> 98 -> "b"
01101001 -> 105 -> "i"
01101110 -> 110 -> "n"
01100001 -> 97 -> "a"
01110010 -> 114 -> "r"
01111001 -> 121 -> "y"
01101101 -> 109 -> "m"
01100101 -> 101 -> "e"
01110011 -> 115 -> "s"
01110011 -> 115 -> "s"
01100001 -> 97 -> "a"
01100111 -> 103 -> "g"
01100101 -> 101 -> "e"
01100010 -> 98 -> "b"
01100101 -> 101 -> "e"
01110100 -> 116 -> "t"
01110100 -> 116 -> "t"
01100101 -> 101 -> "e"
01110010 -> 114 -> "r"
01110100 -> 116 -> "t"
01101000 -> 104 -> "h"
01101001 -> 105 -> "i"
01101110 -> 110 -> "n"
01101011 -> 107 -> "k"
01100001 -> 97 -> "a"
01100111 -> 103 -> "g"
01100001 -> 97 -> "a"
01101001 -> 105 -> "i"
01101110 -> 110 -> "n"
01110100 -> 116 -> "t"
01101000 -> 104 -> "h"
01101001 -> 105 -> "i"
01110011 -> 115 -> "s"
01101010 -> 106 -> "j"
01110101 -> 117 -> "u"
01110011 -> 115 -> "s"
01110100 -> 116 -> "t"
01100001 -> 97 -> "a"
01100010 -> 98 -> "b"
01101001 -> 105 -> "i"
01101110 -> 110 -> "n"
01100001 -> 97 -> "a"
01110010 -> 114 -> "r"
01111001 -> 121 -> "y"
01101101 -> 109 -> "m"
01100101 -> 101 -> "e"
```

## Result
```cipheriscomplexbetterthinkagainthisisjustabinarymessage```
